item.title: I'm In Love With You
item.description: [Am] It's late in the evening [C] And I'm waiting for you [Am] Soon I'll stop breathing [C] And I blame it on the full moon So [F] darling, please [G] believe I'm in love with [C] you [Am] Leave your shoes at the door [C] I can't wait no more [Am] We might be too young [C] But I think we're in love. So [F] darling, please [G] believe I'm in love with [C] you [F] Time flies by [G] your eyes [Am] When I am with you I [C] feel alive
